title: What is energy in terms of quantum physics? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are no such things. You are probably trying to refer to the 4 fundamental forces of fundamental physics. They are: -strong nuclear force (keeps proton, neutron and nuclei together) -weak nuclear force (controls nuclear decays and neutrino interactions) -electromagnetic force (controls all electric and magnetic phenomena, keeps atoms together) -gravitatimal force (gravity)
